attributes.action: Stop Rishi Sunak removing Trans peoples rights from the Equality Act 2010
attributes.additional_details:
34% of Trans people attempt suicide - is that what you want Mr Prime Minister?

64% of young trans people are bullied. My son has experienced this..  again is this OK?

73% of trans people are harassed in public ( raging from insults to physical violence) - Are you condoning this Mr Prime minister? 

21% of trans people avoid going out in public due to fear!

So basically the Prime Minister is punishing people for simply being happy and trying to live their lives?
attributes.background:
By removing the legal protection  for Transgender people in the UK. This means Trans people will no longer be able to safely access same-sex spaces.
Discrimination will be legal too in the workplace. This is putting so many Trans people at risk!
